name: Of Dunes And Grease
description:
This game is made for the Game Maker's Toolkit jam with the theme ' Dual Purpose Design'. 

Of Dunes and Grease is an enemy waves game, where you play as a robot on a desert hunting oil. Your own oil reservoirs are leaking, so you need to get it from other bots.

The mechanics used in the game and that serve dual purpose are the player's robot's health. It consists out of 4 reservoirs of oil, if all empty, the robot dies. These oils also represent abilities, Damage, Speed, Jump and Defence. The more oil the player has, the better the ability. When a oil reservoir is empty, it breaks and can not be filled

if you any questions about the game or if you  just feel like it, leave a comment.

Credits: 

ART - Mimosa, PROGRAMMING - Pieter

Sounds: NoiseForFun, BenSound, FreeSound
